artist: Artist: Paul Jenkins; Printer: Smith Andersen Editions, Palo Alto, California; Publisher: Smith Andersen Editions, Palo Alto, California
creditline: Gift of Jim and Ruth Ann Benson
description: image of the torso and head of a figure in multicolored pigments; yellow and blue in head area; red torso with crossing bands on R and L, that merge horizontally in the C; thick bands in forest green pigment on R and L; dripping pigment in rainbow colors at bottom; white background; floating mount, with light wood frame
inscription: LRQ, in pencil: Okawara Samurai | monotype 1993
title: Okawara Samurai
